T02D2118:156a-0: @156a ` // 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2118:156a-1: da ni rab tu gnas pa bya ste /
T02D2118:156a-2: dkyil 'khor bris la mtshan rnams dkyil 'khor la bkod la /
T02D2118:156a-3: sku'i rab gnas rnam snang la bstim /
T02D2118:156a-4: gsung gi rab gnas snang ba mtha' yas la bstim /
T02D2118:156a-5: thugs kyi rab gnas mi bskyod pa la bstim par bya'o //
T02D2118:156b-0: gong ltar s'atstsha btab nas mchod rten @156b gyi mnga' gsol te /
T02D2118:156b-1: mchod pa rnams gzhung bzhin du bsams la /
T02D2118:156b-3: ye shes rang snang sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas //
T02D2118:156b-4: 'khor lo thig ma thig bzhi bar rim can //
T02D2118:156b-5: gnas bzhi'i dbyibs tshul sgo bzhi sgo brtsegs ldan //
T02D2118:156b-6: rang bzhin lhun grub mchod rten brgyad po gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-7: bcom ldan sbrul sku mdzad pa las byung ba'i //
T02D2118:156b-8: lha las babs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-9: padma can gyi mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-10: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-11: cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-12: rang bzhin lhun grub mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-13: rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-14: ka ni ka yi mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-15: bkra shis sgo mangs mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-16: ye shes blo stegs mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-17: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-18: mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-19: dregs pa'i phung po dur khrod brgyad kyi rten //
T02D2118:156b-20: mkha' 'gro'i gnas dang dngos grub kun gyi gzhi //
T02D2118:156b-21: bde gshegs rten dang ri bo la sogs pa //
T02D2118:156b-22: sgrub pa'i mchod rten brgyad po gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-23: de dag kun dang theg pa so so yi //
T02D2118:156b-24: tha snyad rnams dang mthun par rten bzhengs pa'i //
T02D2118:156b-25: sprul ba'i mchod rten mtha' dag dang //
T02D2118:156b-26: 'gro ba'i don phyir gshegs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-27: ae hye hi dharma k'a ya kha da la bhyo brum dri shya ho //
T02D2118:156b-30: dza: h'um bam ho: de nas gdan 'bul ba ni /
T02D2118:156b-31: dag pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D2118:156b-32: rin chen sna tshogs 'bru nyid dang //
T02D2118:156b-33: thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan //
T02D2118:156b-34: padma'i gdan la gzhugs su gsol //
T02D2118:156b-35: aom padma ka ma la ye h'um /
T02D2118:156b-36: de nas phyag bya ba ni /
T02D2118:156b-37: mdzad pa rdzogs pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba'i //
T02D2118:156b-38: shar nas byams ldan mthar legs rdo rje rdzogs //
T02D2118:156b-39: lho nas yid bzhin lhun grub ka ni ka / nub nas bsam 'das bde byed padma brtsegs //
T02D2118:156b-40: byang nas khams gsum rmad grags bde rgyas sgron //
T02D2118:156b-41: byin rlabs mchod rten brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2118:157a-3: de nas mchod pa rnams gzhung bzhin du bya /
T02D2118:157a-4: de nas smon lam gdab ste /
T02D2118:157a-5: bdag cag gis dge sbyor du bya ba ni /
T02D2118:157a-6: sems can mthun pa bskyed nas sa gzhi legs par snyoms nas chag chag btab pas /
T02D2118:157a-7: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems su mnyam
T02D2118:157a-8: gyur cig / rmang bting ste 'gyed 'dud btang nas
T02D2118:157a-9: rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas
T02D2118:157a-10: dge ba cu'i lam spyod cing ma chags par gyur
T02D2118:157a-11: cig // byang chub gyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lam la sbyor ba la /
T02D2118:157a-12: tshogs kyi lam sbyor ba'i lam mthong ba'i lam bsgom pa'i lam /
T02D2118:157a-14: tshogs lam bzhi sum cu gnyis la bang rim dang po brtsigs te /
T02D2118:157a-15: rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas
T02D2118:157a-16: tshogs kyi lam du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
T02D2118:157a-17: bzhi la / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D2118:157a-18: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D2118:157a-19: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D2118:157a-20: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang ldan par
T02D2118:157a-21: gyur cig / bang rim gsum pa brtsigs ter ba
T02D2118:157a-22: gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas yang
T02D2118:157a-23: dag par spong ba bzhi la sdig pa'i chos mi
T02D2118:157a-24: skye ba dang / skyes pa spang ba dang dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa bskyed pa dang /
T02D2118:157a-26: bar rim gsum pa brtsigs te /
T02D2118:157a-27: de la rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin bgyis
T02D2118:157a-28: pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la mos pa'i
T02D2118:157a-29: ting nge 'dzin gyis spod ba'i 'du byed dang ldan
T02D2118:157a-30: pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkeng ba dang /
T02D2118:157a-31: sems la sbyod bardzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2118:157a-32: brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
T02D2118:157a-33: ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
T02D2118:157a-34: pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur cig / bang rim
T02D2118:157a-38: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
T02D2118:157a-39: shes rab kyi dbang po dang /
T02D2118:157a-40: dad pa'i dbang po dang ldan par gyur cig / bum rten nor bu brtsigs te /
T02D2118:157a-41: de la rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas /
T02D2118:157a-42: nges mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pas /
T02D2118:157a-43: stobs lnga la dad pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2118:157b-2: shes rab kyi stobs lnga dang ldan par gyur cig
T02D2118:157b-3: / bum pa brtsigs te rab gnas dang mchod pa
T02D2118:157b-6: byang chub yan lag bdun la dran pa yang dag
T02D2118:157b-7: byang chub kyi yan lag / chos rnam par 'byed
T02D2118:157b-8: pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag / brtson
T02D2118:157b-9: 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag / dga'
T02D2118:157b-10: ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag / shin
T02D2118:157b-11: tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub gyi yan lag
T02D2118:157b-12: / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan
T02D2118:157b-13: lag btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
T02D2118:157b-14: bdun dang ldan par gyur cig / bre legs par
T02D2118:157b-15: brtsigs te / de la rab gnas dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bgyis pas /
T02D2118:157b-16: bsgom pa'i lam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la /
T02D2118:157b-19: yang dag pa'i ngag / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'/
T02D2118:157b-24: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la rgyun du gnas
T02D2118:157b-25: par gyur cig / aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a
T02D2118:157b-26: h'a / chos kyi sku'i srog shing la /
T02D2118:157b-27: srog shing phul pa'i byin rlabs kyis sems can thams
T02D2118:157b-28: cad shes pa bcu dang ldan par gyur cig /
T02D2118:157b-29: aom pra marda na ye sv'a h'a //
T02D2118:157b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la /
T02D2118:157b-31: 'khor lo phub pa'i byin rlabs kyis mthar phyin pa'i
T02D2118:157b-32: sems can thams cad ma 'dres pa rnam par thar
T02D2118:157b-33: pa brgyad dang ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig
T02D2118:157b-34: / aom bha ma na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2118:157b-35: chos kyi sku'i mchod rten la 'gre gdugs phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis /
T02D2118:157b-36: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i skyabs dang
T02D2118:157b-37: ldan par gyur cig / aom kum bhi ra dhva
T02D2118:157b-40: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis
T02D2118:157b-41: sems can la 'khor ba mi spod mi stongs shes
T02D2118:157b-42: / mi nub pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan thob par
T02D2118:157b-43: gyur cig / aom pa tam k'a ya sv'a h'a
T02D2118:157b-44: / / chos kyi sku'i mchod rten la /
T02D2118:157b-45: ba dan phul ba'i byin brlabs kyis /
T02D2118:157b-46: chos kyi snyan grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob
T02D2118:157b-47: par gyur cig / aom pa tam k'a la mpv'a
T02D2118:157b-48: ya sv'a h'a / chos kyi sku'i mchod rten la /
T02D2118:158a-2: sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i skur gyur te /
T02D2118:158a-3: dar gyi lha ba lha ba dang /
T02D2118:158a-4: bsnyen ba kur mchod pa rgyun mi 'chang pa thob par gyur cig / aom ratna m'a la tra'm /
T02D2118:158a-5: chos kyi me tog gi phreng ba phul bas /
T02D2118:158a-6: sems sda can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D2118:158a-7: blta bas chog mi shes par gyur cig / aom badzra dar sv'a h'a //
T02D2118:158a-9: dar dbyangs phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis /
T02D2118:158a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par so sor gsal bar gyur cig / aom badzra ghanta sv'a h'a /
T02D2118:158a-11: chos kyi dril bu phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis ;
T02D2118:158a-12: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rnga thob par gyur cig
T02D2118:158a-13: / chos kyi me tog phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis
T02D2118:158a-14: / rnam par thar pa mthar phyin pa'i lam la
T02D2118:158a-15: 'khor 'das dbyer mi phyed pa kun du bzang po
T02D2118:158a-16: lta bu thob par gyur cig chos kyi sku'i mchod
T02D2118:158a-17: rten la nyi zla gnyis kyi rgyan phul ba'i byin
T02D2118:158a-18: / rlabs kyis / rang 'byung gi chos rnams rang
T02D2118:158a-19: bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar gyur cig / de bzhin
T02D2118:158a-20: gshegs pa'i skug dud rnams sbyan drangs /
T02D2118:158a-21: gdan phul phyag btsal mchod pa phul bas /
T02D2118:158a-22: sa dang po nas sa bcug cig gi bar dmigs
T02D2118:158a-23: pa med pa'i shes rab sa bcu pa dmigs pa
T02D2118:158a-25: de gnyis dbyer med pa rigs drug pa rdo rje
T02D2118:158a-26: 'chang gis bcu gsum pa ye shes thob par gyur
T02D2118:158a-28: mchod pa gor mis gzhung bzhin bgyis la /
T02D2118:158a-30: spyan lnga rab rib rnam dag skyon bral ba //
T02D2118:158a-31: gsal dang mi gsal rnam rtog mi mnga' yang //
T02D2118:158a-32: sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul du ni //
T02D2118:158a-33: sbyan gyi dbang po gsal ba'i tshul bstan nas //
T02D2118:158a-34: lha yi spyan dang rtag tu lhan gyur cig /
T02D2118:158a-35: ye shes spyan dang rtag tu ldan gyur cig /
T02D2118:158a-37: lhan cig skyes pa'i nang gi gzugs //
T02D2118:158a-38: rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan la 'bul //
T02D2118:158a-39: gzugs kyi longs spyod rdzogs gyur cig / aom sarba ta tha' ga ta badzra a'a lo ke h'um /
T02D2118:158a-40: sgra skad kun la 'phrul gyi snyan mnga' ba //
T02D2118:158a-41: 'on dang rmongs pa'i rnam rtog mi mnga' yang //
T02D2118:158a-42: sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du //
T02D2118:158a-43: snyan gyi dbang po gsal ba'i tshul bstan nas //
T02D2118:158a-44: lha yi snyan dang rtag tu ldan gyur cig / snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra //
T02D2118:158b-0: sgra yi longs spyod @158b rdzogs gyur cig / aom badzra ghande h'um /
T02D2118:158b-1: shangs kyi dbang po rnam dag skyon med pa //
T02D2118:158b-2: dri min dri ma'i rnam rtog mi mnga' yang /
T02D2118:158b-3: srid zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul can du //
T02D2118:158b-4: shangs kyi dbang po gsal ba'i chul bstan nas //
T02D2118:158b-5: ye shes rlung gis nyon mongs gtor byas te //
T02D2118:158b-6: rnam par byang ba'i tshogs dang ldan gyur cig / lhan cig skyes pa nang gi dri //
T02D2118:158b-7: rgyal ba rnams kyi shangs la 'bul //
T02D2118:158b-8: dri yi longs spyod rdzogs gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bushpe h'um //
T02D2118:158b-9: ljags kyi dbang po le brgan 'bar ba la //
T02D2118:158b-10: mngar dang kha yi rnam rtog mi mnga' yang /
T02D2118:158b-11: sri zhu bkur ste rim gro'i tshul tsam du //
T02D2118:158b-12: ljags kyi dbang po gzhar po'i tshul bstan nas //
T02D2118:158b-13: gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu ldan pa dang //
T02D2118:158b-14: 'gro ba kun gyis gra ru chos ston shog / ro brgya ldan pa bdud rtsi'i zas //
T02D2118:158b-15: lhan cig skyes pa nang gi ro //
T02D2118:158b-16: rgyal ba rnams gyi ljags pa la 'bul //
T02D2118:158b-17: ro yi longs spyod rdzogs gyur cig / aom sarba ta tha' ga ta badzra nee bi dye h'um ;
T02D2118:158b-18: rgyal ba'i sku mchog lta bas mi 'bral yang //
T02D2118:158b-19: 'dod pa'i dri ma'i skyon gyis mgos te //
T02D2118:158b-20: sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du //
T02D2118:158b-21: ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku phyis pas //
T02D2118:158b-22: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa dang //
T02D2118:158b-23: 'gro ba kun gyi yid du 'ong bar shog /'jam
T02D2118:158b-24: mnyen 'khril dang ldan pa'i mchog / lhan cig skyes
T02D2118:158b-26: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la mchod //
T02D2118:158b-27: reg bya'i longs spyod rdzogs gyur cig / aom sarba ta tha' ga ta ti kti sinti ri h'um /
T02D2118:158b-28: kun tu rtog pa ma lus pa //
T02D2118:158b-29: dri ma bral ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2118:158b-30: chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo nyid //
T02D2118:158b-31: bde gshegs gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2118:158b-32: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02D2118:158b-33: rgyal bsras dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D2118:158b-34: sku ni mi yi rten la bzhugs //
T02D2118:158b-35: gsung ni brjod pa rnam par rgyal //
T02D2118:158b-36: thugs ni mnyam gzhag mi rtog kyang //
T02D2118:158b-37: sems can rnams kyi don slad du //
T02D2118:158b-38: dbu yi gtsug na yi ge aom //
T02D2118:158b-39: rnam snang yi ge phyogs bcur 'phros //
T02D2118:158b-40: sems can lus kyi sgrib pa sbyong //
T02D2118:158b-41: ljags kyi steng na ye ge aam //
T02D2118:158b-42: snang mtha' yi ge phyogs bcur 'phros //
T02D2118:158b-43: sems can rnams kyi sgrib pa sbyong //
T02D2118:158b-44: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul /
T02D2118:159a-0: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos @159a * //
